title: Let's Take A Look Back At A Fabulous Vikings Career For Adrian Peterson | Vikings Blog | KFAN FM 100.3
text:
Let's Take A Look Back At A Fabulous Vikings Career For Adrian Peterson posted by Alexander Shun - share 
Minnesota Vikings General Manager Rick Spielman said Thursday via conference call that, after signing free agent running back Latavius Murray, they would not be bringing back former first-round pick and All-Pro running back Adrian Peterson. 
With the Peterson era now at an end, it's only fitting to look back at Peterson's spectacular tenure with the Vikings. After watching a multitude of highlight videos on YouTube (yes, there are a ton of them) I felt this one best highlighted his speed, power, agility and incredible ability in the ground game, passing game and in protection. 
Check it out below and be sure to share your favorite Peterson memory/play. Check out Vikings.com for more information and Minnesota Vikings coverage throughout the year! Contact
